name: UFO (Mr Afroduck)
description:
Made for CurdleJam#26 themed: "Cutting Loose"

v1.1 update now adds sfx (uploaded within jam time)

Created in the last 24 hours of the jam.

Supports gamepad.

You play as an alien, and the aim is to cut loose and blow off steam by totally destroying a worthless human settlement. Use your tractor beam, bombs, and a flamethrower to destroy everything in site.

Built using Godot 3.4
Pixel art made in Aseprite
Cutscene panels made in Clip Studio Paint
Music created in LMMS
Sfx created in Bfxr
Voice clips recorded and edited using Audacity
